## EntityEventPayloads."ENTITY.SET\_MODEL\_SHOWN\_NODES" property

Emitted when nodes of the entity's model are set to be shown.

**Signature:**

```typescript
[EntityEvent.SET_MODEL_SHOWN_NODES]: {
        entity: Entity;
        modelShownNodes: Set<string>;
    };
```
